title: Riot guys up for games?.
body:
Any rito members up for some norm games?
Im playing with friends atm and they said it would be cool to play with riot.

Where just either getting IP or mastery points.

replies.body: Let's do another Bronze vs Silver match.
Wasn't Nature, OccasionallyDead or GoldenT the ones that organized that stuff?

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=e7moLZRj,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-24T07:53:16.403+0000)
>
> Wasn't Nature, OccasionallyDead or GoldenT the ones that organized that stuff?

Yeah I think it was GoldenTomato. I think a lot of them are dead since Boards came out.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=e7moLZRj,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-24T07:53:16.403+0000)
>
> Wasn't Nature, OccasionallyDead or GoldenT the ones that organized that stuff?

That sounds really fun.

I think we are friends on league, make sure to invite me when you score a game ;)
I had one game with a riot member, I stole all his kills :P
I would love to play with Riot as well, I've had a few dealings with them on support and they seem like friendly funny people.
